# This file contains the median and +/- one and two sigma IFMRs obtained in
# the paper "An empirical measurement of the initial-final mass relation with
# Gaia white dwarfs". The first column is M_initial in Msun. The next 5 columns
# give percentiles of M_WD in Msun. The percentiles are: 2.3, 15.9, 50, 84.1, 97.7.
# So for example, if you wanted to plot the median IFMR, you'd plot the first 
# column against the fourth one. If you wanted to show the 1-sigma credibility
# region, you'd plot the first column vs a fill between the 3rd and 5th column. Etc.
# 
# Our IFMR parameterization is piecewise-linear. The data here are not strictly 
# linear, but are produced as follows. We drew a large number of samples from the
# posterior distribution, and predicted the IFMR on a grid of M_initial (the first
# column) for each sample. Then we computed the percentiles at each gridpoint.  

0.950 0.497 0.501 0.505 0.509 0.513

1.306 0.528 0.533 0.537 0.541 0.546
